text: aur jin logon ne apane deen ko khel aur tamaasha bana rakha hai aur duniya kee zindagee ne un ko dhoke mein daal rakha hai aise logon ko chhodo aur quraan ke zarie se unako naseehat karate raho (aisa na ho ki koee) shakhsh apane karatoot kee badaulat mubtilae bala ho jae (kyonki us vakt) to khuda ke siva usaka na koee saraparast hoga na siphaarishee aur agar vah apane gunaah ke aivaz saare (jahaann ka) badala bhee de to bhee unamen se ek na liya jaega jo log apanee karanee kee badaulat mubtilae bala hue hai unako peene ke lie khaulata hua garm paanee (milega) aur (un par) dardanaak azaab hoga kyonkar vah kufr kiya karate the
